Name: The Book of Kells
Ingredients: 2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Snifter/Brandy balloon glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A Vieux Carré with more whiskey than cognac, and we're talking Irish whiskey rather than rye or bourbon.
History: Created in 2015 by John Marshall at Melaza Bistro in Woodstock, Vermont, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of The Book of Kells contains 202 calories
